com.turbomanage.httpclient
Class AsyncHttpClient

java.lang.Object
  com.turbomanage.httpclient.AbstractHttpClient
      com.turbomanage.httpclient.AsyncHttpClient
Direct Known Subclasses:
AndroidHttpClient
public class AsyncHttpClient
extends AbstractHttpClient

An HTTP client that completes all requests asynchronously using DoHttpRequestTask. All methods take a callback argument which is passed to the task and whose methods are invoked when the request completes or throws on exception.

Author:
David M. Chandler

tryMany

public HttpResponse tryMany(HttpRequest httpRequest)
                     throws HttpRequestException
Tries several times until successful or maxRetries exhausted. Must throw exception in order for the async process to forward it to the callback's onError method.

Parameters:
httpRequest -
Returns:
Throws:
HttpRequestException

setMaxRetries

public void setMaxRetries(int maxRetries)
Set maximum number of retries to attempt, capped at 18. On the 18th retry, the connection timeout will be 4,181 sec = 1 hr 9 min.

Parameters:
maxRetries -
